showerReviews.reviewText: A great place to hang out with my 3-year-old.  The playground was quite big and diverse that it kept my son busy for hours.  We then took a break and went for a walk around the woods, and the pond. The place felt safe, clean, and not so busy.

I used the basketball/volleyball courts at this facility. It's clean with nice flooring. Haven't used the weight room so I can't tell much about it. The facility has ample parking space and most of the staff are friendly. Nice community gym in Rockville.

showerReviews.reviewText: … machine that was broken. The machines and area are clean. The locker room is fine. The shower heads are tiny and seem to change daily with scolding hot to tepid. I am sure this is normal in gyms (admittedly this is the first gym I have …
My are always so excited to come to the gym with me! All of the teachers there are great! Ms. Bella and Ms. Khalese shower both my kiddos with so much love ❤️❤️❤️

The gym is great , but staff is a little rude they take you out from the shower if is time to close specially on Fridays , machines aren’t clean and  proper disinfected I go there every day for a run and the machines are dirty and …

… racket in disguise. Locker room floors are always DIRTY, at least 2-3 shower drains are clogged at all times and MOLD is something you don't have to look for, it's there in every shower and surrounding areas. It's an amazing experience …
… 2. broken faucets in showers and molding everywhere. …

… have slipped or injured something with is a law suit waiting to happen, it’s also not practical as I’m trying to take a shower or tie my shoes, it felt like the teacher in my classroom was telling the class to be quiet. This should be a …

- Lacks of machine compare to the people.
- about 50% of shower rooms failed to work. (low temperatures,  clogging of drains)
- it would be nice if we can have lotion, hair dryer, especially winter time.
A member since 2009 at Rio.
